pullRequest.title: [mactts] Fixed MacTTS producing empty files
pullRequest.bodyText:
The additional quotes in the command line made the process to only create an empty file, since the voice could not be found - this completely broke this TTS service.
Additionally, I have added some logging and sanity checks.
Signed-off-by: Kai Kreuzer kai@openhab.org

commit.message:
Fixed MacTTS producing empty files

Signed-off-by: Kai Kreuzer <kai@openhab.org>

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't these be check before executing the command?
